exclusion.criterion: Quality of life is assessed at baseline, at months 3, 9, and 12, at completion of study treatment, and then every 6 months for up to 5 years.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: After completion of study treatment, patients are followed every 6 months for up to 10 years.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Monoclonal protein by immunoelectrophoresis or immunofixation of the serum or urine OR abnormal free light-chain ratio
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Soft tissue involvement including the tongue, submandibular tissues, and vascular claudication
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Diffuse interstitial pulmonary AL disease allowed if pulmonary function is adequate to allow safe transplantation
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with systemic amyloidosis, on hemodialysis for ESRD. She was treated with various regimens and has relapsed disease.
